description: A Python source file that contains functions for generating C++ code for JSON RPC emitter and related infrastructure based on some schema objects. It includes code to emit RPC registration, deregistration, event handlers, and versioning logic, coordinating with an emitter object to produce source code strings.

methods.name: EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False)
methods.description: Generates C++ code to emit JSON RPC events, including method prototypes, JSON conversion, and notification logic.

methods.name: _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])
methods.description: Generates the Prologue section of the RPC source, including includes, namespace setup, and version code.

methods.name: _EmitRpcEpilogue(root, emit, ns)
methods.description: Completes the namespace declarations and cleans up after the RPC code section.

methods.name: _EmitVersionCode(emit, version)
methods.description: Generates C++ code defining the version constants within a namespace.

methods.name: _EmitRpcCode(root, emit, ns, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Main function to generate the entire RPC source code including registration, deregistration, and event registration.

methods.name: EmitRpcCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Coordinates emitting the full RPC code, including the prologue and epilogue, via internal functions.

methods.name: EmitRpcVersionCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Generates version coding in the RPC source file, including prologue, version constants, and epilogue.

methods.name: _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")

ctags.name: EmitEvent
ctags.pattern: /^def EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False):$/

ctags.name: _EmitRpcPrologue
ctags.pattern: /^def _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = []):$/
ctags.signature: (root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])

ctags.name: _Invoke
ctags.pattern: /^            def _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", re/
ctags.signature: (params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")
